title: DeKalb cops arrest man on murder charge in Kroger shooting
title_page: DeKalb cops arrest man on murder charge in Kroger shooting
text:
DeKalb County deputies arrested a man in the fatal Tuesday shooting outside a Kroger in Decatur.
Dra James, 27, faces a charge of felony murder, the department said Thursday. The Decatur man is accused of killing Jeremiah Flemister, also of Decatur.
READ | DA: Georgia man, others trained kids to do school shootings in desert
An argument inside the Kroger spilled out into the parking lot at Memorial and Columbia drives. Officers said the shooting was captured on video surveillance.
K-9 and SWAT units arrested James at a home in Lithonia Thursday.
